Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a potential technology for utilizing biomass to generate electricity with high conversion efficiency and low pollution.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Investigations on biomass integrated gasification SOFC system show that gasifier is one of the high cost factors which impede the practical application of such systems.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) may provide a cost effective option for electricity generation from biomass because it can operate directly using biochar as the fuel so that the gasification process can be avoided.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, the feasibility of using corn cob char as the fuel of a DC-SOFC to generate electricity is investigated.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrolyte-supported SOFCs, with yttrium stabilized zirconia (YSZ) as the electrolyte, cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) as the anode and the cathode, are prepared and tested with fixed bed corn cob char as fuel and static ambient air as oxidant.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The maximum power output of a DC-SOFC operated on pure corn cob char is 204 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: and it achieves 270 mW cm(-2) when Fe of 5% mass fraction, as a catalyst of the Boudouard reaction, is loaded on the corn cob char.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The discharging time of the cell with 0.5 g corn cob char operated at a constant current of 0.1 A lasts 17 h, representing a fuel conversion of 38%.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), energy dispersive spectrometer (EDS) and Raman spectroscopy have been applied to characterize the char-based fuels.
Titulo: Electricity generation from corn cob char though a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell
